Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class LobbyHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.LobbyHandler
public class LobbyHandler extends Object
Class that manages the client in the lobby and the new match creation.

  • Method Details

    • getLobbyHandler

      public static LobbyHandler getLobbyHandler()
      Returns the instance of the LobbyHandler.
      Returns:
      the instance of LobbyHandler

    • addClient

      public void addClient(User user, ServerClientConnection serverClientConnection) throws IllegalArgumentException, InterruptedGameException
      Adds a user to the list of clients waiting for a game to start. After the addition of the user this method starts a game if the number of users with same preference equals the preference.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to add
      serverClientConnection - the server-client connection associated with the user
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the preference of the user is invalid
      InterruptedGameException - if something bad happens during match creation
      See Also:
      • User
      • ServerClientConnection

    • changePreference

      public void changePreference(String userId, int newPreference) throws IllegalArgumentException, UserNotFoundException, InterruptedGameException
      Changes the preference of the user with username userId.
      Parameters:
      userId - the username of the user
      newPreference - the new preference
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the preference is invalid
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with username userId could not be found
      InterruptedGameException
      See Also:
      • User

    • checkIfUsernameIsUsed

      public boolean checkIfUsernameIsUsed(String userId)
      Checks if a username is used by a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the username
      Returns:
      true if the username is used by a user, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • User

    • getClientsWaiting

      public Map<Integer,Map<User,ServerClientConnection>> getClientsWaiting()
      Gets a copy of the map with the clients waiting for a game to start.
      Returns:
      the map with the clients waiting

    • emptyMap

      public void emptyMap()
      Clears the map. Method used by tests in TestSerializer.

    • removeActiveGame

      public void removeActiveGame(GameController gameController)
      Removes the active game from the activeGames list (if present: this could be called for an error during game start when I don't have the game in the list yet), because it ended. The interruptGame in GameController calls this.
      Parameters:
      gameController - the game controller of the match

    • removeActiveGameAndCommunicateWinners

      public void removeActiveGameAndCommunicateWinners(String username, Integer[] winners) throws NoSuchElementException
      Removes the active game from the activeGames list, because it ended. Will be called by the CheckEndMatchCondition when the match ends (that action can only pass a username, doesn't know what a GameController is, so this method is necessary).
      Parameters:
      username - the username of a player in that game.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the username could not be found in any active game

    • removeDisconnectedUser

      public void removeDisconnectedUser(User user) throws NoSuchElementException
      Removes the user and his ServerClientConnection from the users in lobby. Clients in lobby are notified for this lobby edit.
      Parameters:
      user - the user that has to be removed
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the User could not be found in waiting users
      See Also:
      • User
